law.catch_line: The Commission shall set a service rate that the Commission considers necessary to provide funds for...

text.section:
The Commission shall set a service rate that the Commission considers necessary to provide funds for:
maintaining, repairing, and operating its water supply and sewer systems, including the overhead expense and depreciation allowance; and
making any payments to the District of Columbia, as specified in this title.

The service rate:
shall be chargeable against all properties for a connection with any line owned by the Commission;
shall be uniform throughout the sanitary district; and
may be changed as necessary.
